import React from "react"; import "./image-carosel.styles.scss"; const ImageCarosel = () => { const mouseMoveHandler = event => { let mouseX = event.pageX - event.target.offsetLeft; let mouseY = event.pageY - event.target.offsetTop; console.log(event.target.offsetLeft) // event.target.style.left+=mouseX+'%'; // event.target.style.top+=mouseY+'%' } return (
); }; export default ImageCarosel;
